name: Construction drone foreman
descriptions: Construction drone foreman is a Protectron found at Big MT in 2281.

Located at the construction site, this unique Protectron is painted yellow and is outfitted with a modified head, reminiscent of a miner's hat with a headlamp. It is hostile and has health equal to that of a Protectron Mk 6, making it a formidable opponent.
The construction drone foreman appears only in the Fallout: New Vegas add-on Old World Blues.
